tasks.label: modular: lint & test all
tasks.command:
set -euo pipefail
if command -v golangci-lint >/dev/null 2>&1; then golangci-lint version; fi
export GOTOOLCHAIN=auto
export CGO_ENABLED=0
# Lint (best-effort)
if command -v golangci-lint >/dev/null 2>&1; then golangci-lint run || true; fi
# Core tests
go test ./... -v
# Modules
for module in modules/*/; do
  if [ -f "$module/go.mod" ]; then
    echo "Testing $module";
    (cd "$module" && go test ./... -v);
  fi
done
# Examples
for example in examples/*/; do
  if [ -f "$example/go.mod" ]; then
    echo "Testing $example";
    (cd "$example" && go test ./... -v);
  fi
done
# CLI
( cd cmd/modcli && go test ./... -v )
